interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: EVITA PERONI Natural Sandalwood Beech Wooden Hair Brush - Detangling Paddle Hairbrush for Thick fine Curly Straight Dry and Damaged Hair - Unisex Gift for Women Men Kids Girls Review Date: 2021/01/15 Store: EVITA PERONI Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '11.3 x 5.4 x 2.4 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': '70334 159', 'Manufacturer': 'EVITA PERONI'} Review Text: The EVITA PERONI Wooden Hair Brush is a detangling paddle hairbrush. it is 2.8" wide and 7.8" long of natural beech wood. It should be useful for any kind of hair that needs detangling. There are seven rows of wooden bristles that have rounded heads. The bristles are inserted in a silicon padding which allows for a little give and movement.

I would have given this brush a higher rating but the product page for this brush states that it comes with a cloth pouch and a black rake to clean the brush. Neither of those items came with my brush. The only other item in the box was a empty black thin plastic pad with "Touch-Fashion Jewelry Co. LTD" written on it but nothing else. See above. Review Title: Only A Brush Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly, Top Japanese Makeup Remover, Gentle Skin Cleanser, Mild Floral Fragrance, Non-Greasy, 7.8 Ounce Bioré ['Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is a non-greasy makeup remover that removes dirt and impurities from deep below the surface of your skin. This top Japanese makeup remover glides on gently and leaves no sticky residue. Formulated with conditioning beauty essence, this jelly leaves skin feeling moisturized and free of makeup. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.'] {'Product Dimensions': '1.56 x 2.5 x 7.25 inches; 10.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28077_obs', 'UPC': '019100264557', 'Manufacturer': 'Kao USA Inc.'} The Bioré Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is slightly like a watery jelly texture and goes on smoothly for washing away dirt and makeup on your face. You simply pump some of the cleaner in the palm of your hand and then massage it gently on your face to clear away the makeup - then rinse your whole face with water. The scent is mild but very nice. When finished you will not feel any sticky residue. I love the guard on the pump that allows you to put it on the pump when you are not using it so little fingers cannot spread the jelly around when you are not looking nor can the pump squirt out when the bottle falls over or when you are traveling. This product was made in Japan. Love The Guard For The Cap Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly, Top Japanese Makeup Remover, Gentle Skin Cleanser, Mild Floral Fragrance, Non-Greasy, 7.8 Ounce Bioré ['Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is a non-greasy makeup remover that removes dirt and impurities from deep below the surface of your skin. This top Japanese makeup remover glides on gently and leaves no sticky residue. Formulated with conditioning beauty essence, this jelly leaves skin feeling moisturized and free of makeup. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.'] {'Product Dimensions': '1.56 x 2.5 x 7.25 inches; 10.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28077_obs', 'UPC': '019100264557', 'Manufacturer': 'Kao USA Inc.'} Biore Cleansing Oil Makeup Removing Cloths come in a package like most wipes and have a pull tab on the top to open and close the packet. There are 44 wipes in each packet and each wipe is about 4.5 x 5.5 inches (you probably would need 2 or 3 wipes a time if you wear a lot of makeup) and is pre-moisturized. These wipes are to be deposed in the garbage not the toilet and are not to be close to your eyes. Directions state that you should place the cloth on the area that has make-up for about 5 seconds and then wipe off. The scent smells very nice and my skin did feel smooth when done. This product was made in Japan Nice Case For Traveling MAD | Cosmetic's Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes, Daily cleansing face wipes to remove waterproof mascara, alcohol free , with Vitamin E 25 count JUST FOR TOTS BY MAD {'Brand': 'JUST FOR TOTS BY MAD', 'Skin Type': 'Oily', 'Unit Count': '25.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '6.3 x 7.87 x 1.97 inches; 7.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '685757511926'} These "Cosmetic's Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes" are about 7.5 inches by 6.5 Inches and the fabric is sturdy and also a bit stretchy. It is difficult trying to get the wipes out of the package as the opening is too small. These wipes are slightly scented and I found the scent to not be pleasant. Once I had the wipe in my hands and on my face I could not get rid of the smell - not even when I washed both hands and face with my favorite body gel - there was still a bit of the wipe's fragrance. The wipes are infused with Vitamin E and made with Argan oil and Hyaluronic. This product is alcohol free and is moistened to just the right level so it not dripping when taken out the package. Do not dispose these in the toilet. I think this product is made in Hong Kong but not sure of that. Do Not Dispose In Toilet TCM Mancode 101 Men's Hair Conditioner 16oz TCM {'Brand': 'TCM', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'UPC': '851058008421'} The "TCM Mancode 101 Men's Hair Conditioner" has a very nice scent, not overpowering just right. I had my husband try the conditioner following all the direction. The directions have you shampooing your hair and towel dry, then taking a palm sized amount to massage ( I think that is more than you need) from ends to scalp. Then comb with wide tooth comb from the scalp upward to the ends and let it stay in for 5 minutes ( this is a negative to me ...5 minutes waiting is too long). Finally rinse thoroughly and style. It is infused with tea tree oil and Chia seed oil. My husband agreed with my thoughts on amount of product and time. He thought it was just okay, nothing fantastic. The product comes in a metal container - the one I received not dings and creases on the outside but no damage in the inside of container. Nice Scent Christmas Headbands for Women,Glitter headbands Sequence Red and Green,Holiday Costume Headwear Handmade Mouse Ears Hairband Hair Decorations for Girl Party Cosplay Favor Accessories YanJie {'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Occasion': 'Christmas, Party, Birthday, Thanksgiving', 'Material': 'Cotton Blend', 'Brand': 'YanJie', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8 x 6 x 0.2 inches; 0.9 Ounces', 'UPC': '751300682143'} Christmas Headband for women and older girls are cute and colorful, but a bit pricey. They seem to be well made except for the glue that oozed out of the white ears into the headband. Luckily it only show when not on someone's head. I wish the headband itself was a bit wider so that it would fit more secure on your head. Cute & Colorful EVITA PERONI Natural Sandalwood Beech Wooden Hair Brush - Detangling Paddle Hairbrush for Thick fine Curly Straight Dry and Damaged Hair - Unisex Gift for Women Men Kids Girls EVITA PERONI {'Package Dimensions': '11.3 x 5.4 x 2.4 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': '70334 159', 'Manufacturer': 'EVITA PERONI'} The EVITA PERONI Wooden Hair Brush is a detangling paddle hairbrush. it is 2.8" wide and 7.8" long of natural beech wood. It should be useful for any kind of hair that needs detangling. There are seven rows of wooden bristles that have rounded heads. The bristles are inserted in a silicon padding which allows for a little give and movement.

I would have given this brush a higher rating but the product page for this brush states that it comes with a cloth pouch and a black rake to clean the brush. Neither of those items came with my brush. The only other item in the box was a empty black thin plastic pad with "Touch-Fashion Jewelry Co. LTD" written on it but nothing else. See above. Only A Brush
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary**

- **Preferred Product Type:** Concentrates on makeup removers and cleansers, favoring gentle, non-greasy, moisturizing options. Also explores hair care products, particularly conditioners and styling accessories, with an interest in functional and festive items.

- **Quality Indicators:** Prioritizes thorough cleansing without residue while emphasizing moisturizing benefits for skincare and effective conditioning for hair products.

- **Fragrance Sensitivity:** Generally prefers mild scents but is reassessing tolerance due to increased sensitivity to stronger fragrances in both skincare and hair care.

- **Texture Preference:** Enjoys lightweight formulations with unique textures, enhancing experiences in both conditioners and accessories.

- **Product Features:** Values practical features such as protective packaging for safety and convenience, especially in family environments, while seeking ease of access in all product categories.

- **Cultural Influences:** Strongly inclined toward Japanese products, embracing J-Beauty standards, while also exploring innovative brands and festive accessories.

- **Satisfaction Standards:** Looks for high-rating products that are effective and user-friendly. Recent interactions indicate a balanced approach between aesthetic appeal and practicality, evidenced by experiences with accessories, though recent purchases suggest a need for more consistent product fulfillment.

This update reflects a critical engagement with hair care tools and highlights a recent disappointment regarding product completeness, influencing ongoing preferences for user-friendly and reliable accessories.
